Tutorials & Workshops#

General#

  • Modern Methods in Rietveld Refinement and Structural Analysis (MMRRSA) School. Exercises on refining X-ray and neutron Bragg diffraction data are available. See the link here.

  • The TOPAS tutorial series by John Evans, et al. See the link here.

FullProf
